docs.text:
DataSetTools


#


EconTools.descriptive_stats
 
 
Function
.


descriptive_stats(table::DNextTable,var::String,by::Tuple;weight=
None
)




Returns a new table containing  the mean, standard deviation, 1st, 2nd and 3rd quantiles of variable 
var
 by a selection of tuple of columns 
by
. Weights are optional and if specified, the function returns the weighted descriptive statistics.


source


#


EconTools.save_csv
 
 
Function
.


save_csv(path::String,table::DNextTable)
Saves table as CSV at the specified path




source
